message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a great deal for you, considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your position. While I value your interest, $12,000 is unfortunately below my minimum.  Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This still offers you a good value, and it's closer to my ideal price. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the compromise, but I am still unable to meet you at $13,500. I would like to propose $12,500 as a counteroffer. I hope this proposal works for you.
